def unet_forward(
    noisy_latent: Tensor,          # [B, 4, H, W]
    timestep: Tensor,              # [B]
    text_embeddings: Tensor,       # [B, max_len, D]
    control_images: Dict[str, Tensor],  # æ§åˆ¶å›¾ {'canny': [B, 3, H, W], ...}
    mask: Optional[Tensor] = None, # [B, 1, H, W]
    original_latent: Optional[Tensor] = None # [B, 4, H, W] (img2img)
) -> Tensor:
    
    # 1. æ—¶é—´åµŒå…¥
    t_emb = timestep_embedding(timestep)
    
    # 2. å¤„ç†æ§åˆ¶æ¡ä»¶
    control_features = []
    for name, image in control_images.items():
        # é€šè¿‡å¯¹åº”çš„ControlNetåˆ†æ”¯
        feat = controlnet_branches[name](image, t_emb, text_embeddings)
        control_features.append(feat)
    
    # 3. å¤„ç†maskæ¡ä»¶
    if mask is not None:
        # æ‹¼æ¥ä¸ºé¢å¤–é€šé“
        noisy_latent = torch.cat([noisy_latent, mask], dim=1)
    
    # 4. UNetä¸»å¹²å¤„ç†
    x = noisy_latent
    down_samples = []
    
    # ä¸‹é‡‡æ ·è¿‡ç¨‹
    for i, down_block in enumerate(down_blocks):
        # æ®‹å·®å—ï¼ˆåŒ…å«æ—¶é—´èåˆï¼‰
        x = down_block.resnets[0](x, t_emb)
        
        # æ³¨å…¥æ§åˆ¶ç‰¹å¾
        if control_features:
            x = x + control_scale * control_features[i]
        
        # æ³¨æ„åŠ›å±‚ï¼ˆæ–‡æœ¬èåˆï¼‰
        x = down_block.attentions[0](x, text_embeddings)
        
        down_samples.append(x)
        x = down_block.downsampler(x)
    
    # ä¸­é—´å—
    x = mid_block.resnets[0](x, t_emb)
    x = mid_block.attentions[0](x, text_embeddings)
    x = mid_block.resnets[1](x, t_emb)
    
    # ä¸Šé‡‡æ ·è¿‡ç¨‹
    for i, up_block in enumerate(up_blocks):
        # è·³è·ƒè¿æ¥
        x = torch.cat([x, down_samples.pop()], dim=1)
